title: (x) The Storage Barn - ITC Avant Garde Gothic, Futura {Dav}
content:
I need to know what font “Barn” is. Can anyone let me know?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=69419_45496L_gif.gif)
author: evolvegreg

comments.content:
‘Avant Garde’..

_( Edit-A-Bit.: Nah, ‘Futura’ it seems to be.. )_

Dav
THE STORAGE is indeed Avant Garde; Barn is most likely Futura Heavy.
